shortdesc.ph: Updates channel media options after joining a channel.
Updates the channel media options after joining a channel.

p.codeblock: virtual int updateChannelMediaOptionsEx(const ChannelMediaOptions& options, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int updateChannelMediaOptionsEx(ChannelMediaOptions options, RtcConnection connection);

section.title: Scenario
section.p: This method applies to multi-channel scenarios.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-2: Invalid member values in , such as an invalid token or user ID. You need to provide valid parameters.
-7: The object has not been initialized. You need to initialize the object before calling this method.
-8: Internal state error of the object, possibly because the user has not joined the channel. Agora recommends that you use the callback to determine whether the user is in the channel. If you receive CONNECTION_STATE_DISCONNECTED (1) or CONNECTION_STATE_FAILED (5), it means the user is not in the channel. You need to call joinChannel to join the channel before calling this method.
